00025 #ifndef SYX_INIT_H

00027

00029 #include "syx-types.h"
00030 #include "syx-object.h"
00031 
00032 SYX_BEGIN_DECLS
00033 
00035 #define SYX_INIT_MEMORY_SIZE 100000
00036 
00037 EXPORT extern syx_bool syx_system_initialized;
00038 
00039 EXPORT extern syx_bool syx_init (syx_varsize argc, syx_string *argv, syx_symbol root_path);
00040 EXPORT extern void syx_quit (void);
00041 EXPORT extern void syx_build_basic (void);
00042 EXPORT extern void syx_fetch_basic (void);
00043 EXPORT extern void syx_initialize_system (void);
00044 
00045 EXPORT extern syx_string syx_find_file (syx_symbol domain, syx_symbol package, syx_symbol filename);
00046 EXPORT extern syx_symbol syx_get_root_path (void);
00047 EXPORT extern syx_bool syx_set_root_path (syx_symbol root_path);
00048 EXPORT extern syx_bool syx_set_image_path (syx_symbol image_path);
00049 EXPORT extern syx_symbol syx_get_image_path (void);
00050 
00052 #define syx_globals_at(name) (syx_dictionary_at_symbol (syx_globals, (syx_symbol)(name)))
00053 
00054 #define syx_globals_at_if_absent(name,object) (syx_dictionary_at_symbol_if_absent (syx_globals, \
00055                                                                                    (syx_symbol)(name), \
00056                                                                                    object))
00057 
00059 #define syx_globals_at_put(symbol,value) (syx_dictionary_at_symbol_put (syx_globals, (symbol), (value)))
00060 
00061 SYX_END_DECLS
00062 
00063 #endif /* SYX_INIT_H */
